channel.title: Machine_learning on CEDIS
channel.description: Recent content in Machine_learning on CEDIS

item.title: Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing
item.description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a branch of computer science that seeks to develop systems capable of mimicking and enhancing human abilities such as reasoning, learning, and perception. One of its most fascinating subareas is Natural Language Processing (NLP).

item.title: Project DFCris
item.description: A research project in partnership with IBICT and funded by FAP/DF.

item.title: Contextus Portal
item.description: The app and site Contextus redefines scientific analysis with NLP and ML for direct interaction with academic knowledge.

item.title: MAGRA
item.description: The Undergraduate Analysis Model (MAGRA) enables the prediction of dropout rates in face-to-face undergraduate courses.

item.title: SAGA
item.description: The Academic Management Support System - SAGA is a tool developed to assist academic managers in monitoring indicators for undergraduate courses.

item.title: Sergio Antônio Andrade de Freitas
item.description: Full Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program and the Graduate Program in Applied Computing.
